author: vargasa
body:
#### PR description:

Custom made groups added to PhaseI and Phase2 scenarios as discussed in previous Geometry meeting.

FYI: @ianna, @kpedro88, @cvuosalo, @bsunanda 

#### Validation:

```
python Configuration/Geometry/scripts/generate2021Geometry.py -t
python Configuration/Geometry/scripts/generate2026Geometry.py -t
```

Related: https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/geometry/354.html
title: DD4hep: SimTracker/TrackerMaterialAnalysis SpecPars Groups
